game.name: WW2 Rebuilder
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: WWII Rebuilder에서 당신은 2차 세계 대전으로 파괴된 도시들을 복구합니다. 다양한 중장비를 사용하여 잔해를 치우고 벽돌을 쌓아 사람들이 다시 행복하게 살 수 있는 집을 건설하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build the new future of Europe! Flip, renovate, repair and rebuild places destroyed during World War 2. Get to know the history and stories of civilians. Play an immersive building simulator with grappling storytelling.

reviewHighlights.text: Just another sim, nothing too special, the controllers are a little janky, some achievments can get bugged so you might have to redo one of the missio...
Most of the mechanics are fun and relaxing, BUT the mini games are beyond awful and seem more at home in a mobile game made for infants
